forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
Beneath the vast blue expanse, today's weather in Downtown San Francisco unfolds with an inviting clarity. The sun casts its warm embrace upon the city, painting the streets with a soft glow, while temperatures gracefully hover near the mid-60s. The whispers of a gentle wind add a refreshing touch, perfect for meandering through the neighborhoods or savoring the vibrancy of a local café. Presently, there is no sign of the marine layer, allowing views of the iconic Golden Gate Bridge to stand unencumbered against the horizon.

As dusk approaches, the sky will remain mostly clear, with temperatures dipping to a comfortable chill by nighttime. This evening, you might consider donning a light jacket, ideal for strolling along the waterfront or enjoying a quiet dinner al fresco, as the breeze tends to nudge against the skin. In this splendid ambiance, a leisurely walk through Golden Gate Park or engaging with local artisans at an evening market could be delightful ways to savor the golden hour. Embrace the beauty of this crisp day, where the potential for enjoyable moments lingers at every corner of the city.
